summary.span: 表示用于播放 .wav 文件的轻量音频播放 。

span.span: Represents a lightweight audio playback used to play .wav files.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用.wav 文件使用的触发器音频播放上和事件。The following example shows how use the to trigger audio playback of a .wav file using an on the and events. [!code-xaml[MediaGallery_snip#SoundPlayerActionFullPage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MediaGallery_snip/CSharp/SoundPlayerActionTriggers.xaml#soundplayeractionfullpage)] [!code-xaml[MediaGallery_snip#SoundPlayerActionFullPage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MediaGallery_snip/VB/SoundPlayerActionTriggers.xaml#soundplayeractionfullpage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后调用时，对象将不再有效。After is called, the object is no longer valid. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置音频源位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相对和绝对包[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]可以用于标识属于以下类型的音频文件：Both relative and absolute pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] can be used to identify audio files that are of the following types: - **资源文件**： 具有生成操作的文件`Resource`。**Resource Files**: files with a build action of `Resource`. - **内容文件**： 具有生成操作的文件`Content`。**Content Files**: files with a build action of `Content`. - **源站点文件**： 具有生成操作的文件`None`。**Site Of Origin Files**: files with a build action of `None`. 有关详细信息包[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]，请参阅[WPF 中的包 Uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For more information on pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). 有关资源、 内容和源站点文件的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)。For more information on resource, content, and site of origin files, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier Field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
